Sir Francis Bacon is the English philosopher and statesman who was born in 1561. He was the son of Sir Nicholas Bacon and Anne (Cooke) Bacon, and he was born in the Cokelands Manor House at Bacton, Suffolk. He graduated from Magdalen College, Oxford, in 1583.
